channel.title: [Hyperion] NPC Combat
channel.description:
I have a good player versus player system (using [url=http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/downloads/305655-hyperion-perfect-oldschool-base.html]this[/url] source), but no player versus NPC combat. I have just loaded up NPCs because it didn't come with the base, but I need to know how difficult it would be to implement attacking an NPC with regards to the fact I already have a good PVP combat system.
I've never been able to do combat in any server. Is it a matter of changing a couple of things or do you have to have one system for players and a whole new system for NPCs? It's entity based so I assume it's a matter of telling the server what to do when you click the attack packet and that is it? Just need some insight before I dive in.
